subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Marc Staal played Alex Ovechkin tough while shadowing him in Game 1 of their playoff series, but the Capitals’ high-scoring star scored the tying goal late in the third period.
snippet: Defenseman Marc Staal played Alex Ovechkin tough while shadowing him in Game 1 of their playoff series, but the Capitals’ high-scoring star scored the tying goal late in the third period.
